allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add multi-tenant organiser support via club_organisers join table

Replace single-owner clubs.user_id with a many-to-many club_organisers
table so multiple authenticated users can manage the same club. Update
all RLS policies to check membership through club_organisers.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
